question.title: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "What is \"common knowledge\" about being a white person in the USA that's false?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}

answer.content: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "It\u2019s a misconception that white people don\u2019t face racism.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Whenever you are a minority, you are likely to be the subject of racism, and in some places white people are the minority. I\u2019ve always lived in countries where the population is predominantly white, so I haven\u2019t experienced it myself\u2014but other people have told me their experiences. In particular, many Chinese people have admitted that their countrymen are very racist against whites.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "A friend of my son\u2019s grew up in a remote part of Australia that was mainly occupied by indigenous Australians. Her family moved to the area for her father\u2019s job when she was a young child, and she and her siblings were the only white children at the local school. As a pretty, blonde blue-eyed girl, her experience there was horrible. She was regularly bullied: called names, had stones thrown at her, and was kicked and punched. She and her siblings were particularly taunted for their skin and hair colour.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Even when the majority of a country\u2019s population is white, it\u2019s not impossible for whites to experience racism. I once saw a disgusting online argument in which a group of Lebanese Australians and a group of Australians of British background were hurling abuse at each other. Both groups were incredibly vicious, and most of the insults were based on race. I would contend that both sides in that argument were racist\u2014however, I have had conversations with people who claim that racism against white people simply doesn\u2019t exist.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "When non-whites post on social media that they want to kill white people simply because of the colour of their skin, that\u2019s racism. And it\u2019s not \u201creverse racism\u201d, as some people like to call it. It\u2019s racism, pure and simple.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Because there is so much systemic racism against non-whites, sometimes we lose sight of the big picture. Racism against ", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": "anyone\u2014", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}, {"text": "black, brown or white", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": "\u2014", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}, {"text": "is evil.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "", "modifiers": {"image": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-706dc227e803cc35b945735017ab7dbf", "height": 640, "width": 1280, "master_url": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-a3f1edc7af3526cada66929d88e0bf9b", "zoomable": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "image", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Image source: Pixabay.com. CC0 Creative Commons", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}
